DOC.brief_summary: To assess pain nasolabial fold treatment use Radiesse® Injectable Dermal Filler mixed lidocaine .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Pain With Lidocaine-Mixed Radiesse® Injectable Dermal Filler
DOC.detailed_description: To assess pain immediately nasolabial fold treatment Radiesse® Injectable Dermal Filler mixed lidocaine one nasolabial fold compare Radiesse® Injectable Dermal Filler without lidocaine contralateral nasolabial fold .
DOC.criteria: Is least 18 year age . Is candidate nasolabial fold treatment use Radiesse . Understands accepts obligation receive facial procedure low half face 1 month . Understands accepts obligation present schedule followup visit logistically able meet study requirement . Has approximately symmetrical nasolabial fold . Has receive type treatment procedure include surgery nasolabial fold . Has receive neurotoxin low half face past 6 month . Has receive hyaluronic acid , calcium hydroxylapatite ( CaHA ) collagen injection low half face within past 1 ½ year . Has receive polylactic acid , polymethyl methacrylate ( PMMA ) , silicone permanent filler lower half face . Has nasolabial fold severe correct one treatment session . Has history chronic recurrent infection inflammation would preclude participation study . Has know bleed disorder receive medication likely increase risk bleed . Is female child bear potential pregnant use acceptable method birth control . Has history hypersensitivity Lidocaine anesthetic amide type . Has history anaphylaxis multiple severe allergy . Has receive investigational product within 30 day prior study enrollment planning participate another investigation course study .
DOC.keyword: Moderate severe wrinkle fold nasolabial fold
